00054 void VhdlGeneric::write( QTextStream& stream ) const {
00055         Q_ASSERT(!name_.isEmpty());
00056         Q_ASSERT(!type_.isEmpty());
00057 
00058         stream << name_ << " : " << type_;
00059 
00060         // check if type is string then quotations must be used for default value
00061         bool addQuotation = type_.compare(QString("string"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0;
00062         
00063         // if a default value has been specified
00064         if (!defaultValue_.isEmpty()) {
00065                 stream << " := ";
00066                 
00067                 // if default value does not start with quotation
00068                 if (addQuotation && *defaultValue_.begin() != QChar('"')) {
00069                         stream << "\"";
00070                 }
00071                 
00072                 // write the default value
00073                 stream << defaultValue_;
00074 
00075                 // if default value does not end with quotation
00076                 if (addQuotation && *(defaultValue_.end() - 1) != QChar('"')) {
00077                         stream << "\"";
00078                 }
00079         }       
00080 }
